article.title: ViaSat to Provide Special Ops Mobile Satcom
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ViaSat Incorporated, Carlsbad, California, is being awarded a $12,254,000 single-award indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the ArcLight2 KuSS Hub mobile satellite communication system, associated hardware, installation, spares, and operational software license in support of Special Operations forces.Â U.S. Special Operations Command, MacDill Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
